item.title: The Azande
item.description: A Short History of Rationality Outline The trajectory of case studies are excellent ways to track an intellectual debates from a point of view that is both external and internal.

item.title: Mike Leigh
item.description: Suffering the Everyday Mike Leigh’s oeuvre is marked by tales of everyday suffering.
